column2: "Afei Persiahen Sirus n'afe a odzi kan no mu no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔnam Jeremia n'anomu no bɛba mu ntsi
column4: nna EWURADZE maa Persiahen no nyaa atsenka soronko bi wɔ no mu ma ɔmaa wɔkɔbɔɔ dawur kyiin n'ahenman nyinara mu

column3: Asaase do ahendzi nyinara nna EWURADZE
column5: ɔdze ama me; na ɔnoara na ɔdze n'ahyɛdze ama me dɛ minsi fie wɔ Jerusalɛm a ɔwɔ Juda no mma no."

column2: "Obiara a ɔwɔ hom mu a ofi ne man nyinara mu no
column4: na wɔmma ɔmfow nkɔ Jerusalɛm a ɔwɔ Juda no

column2: "Na obiara a ɔaka wɔ beebiara a ɔakɔsoɛ hɔ hɔho no
column3: wɔmma ne bea do hɔ nyimpa no mfa dwetɛ
column7: nka ayamuyi afɔrbɔdze a wɔdze bɛma Nyankopɔn fi no a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no ho

column2: "Nna Juda na Benjamin mu egyanom efiefi etsitsir
column5: mekyerɛ hɔn a Nyankopɔn abɔ hɔn sunsum nkenyan no nyinara
column6: soɛrsoɛree dɛ wɔrofow akɔ ekesi EWURADZE ne fi a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔabɔ hɔnho aprɔw no nyinara wɔdze dwetɛ ndzɛmba
column5: na ɔnye ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo
column7: dze kaa dza wɔdze maa ayamuyi mu no nyinara ho."

column2: "Eso ɔhen Sirus yiyii EWURADZE fie ndzɛmbandzɛmba a Nebukadenezar dze fii Jerusalɛm bae besisii n'enyame fie no;"
"mekyerɛ ɔno na Persiahen Sirus dze nam no fotosamfo Mitredat nsa do bae
column3: na ɔbɛkanee dze hyɛɛ Juda ɔbapɔmba

column2: "Na no dodow nye yi: sika mboyaa eduasa

column3: dwetɛ mbɛɛsen a odzi do hɔ ahaanan na du
column4: na ndzɛmba a ɔkeka ho so apem."

column2: "Sika na dwetɛ ndzɛmba no nyinara yɛ mpemenum na ahaanan. Iyinom nyinara na Sesbazar dze bae
column3: wɔ aber a wɔdze hɔn a wɔkɔr ndɔmmum mu no fi Babilɔn sanee baa Jerusalɛm no."
